name: Scaling
desc: Scaling and root planning, also know as conventional periodontal therapy.

name: Patching
desc: Zygomatic implants are intended to replace teeth in the upper jaw.

name: Bletching
desc: A method of professional oral care that focuses on improving the appearance of your teeth.

name: Ortodontic
desc: To repair the nerve of the tooth that is infected or badly damaged.

name: Root Canal
desc: Corrects irregularities of the jaw bones and realigns the jaws and teeth to improve the way they work.

name: Extraction
desc: Plastic surgery performed on the nose to straighten the nose.
